This is a test post

```{r}
# Load packages
library(car)
library(psych)
library(parameters)
```

## Load and Explore Date

### Clean and Label Data

```{r}
data(mtcars)

mtcars <- transform(mtcars,
                    vs = factor(vs, labels = c("V-shaped", "straight")),
                    am = factor(am, labels = c("automatic", "manual")))
```

### Explore Date

```{r}
hist(mtcars$mpg, main = "Distribution of Outcome Variable")
```



```{r}
pairs.panels(mtcars[, c("mpg", "hp", "vs", "am")])
```
## Models

```{r, results='markup'}
mod.full <- lm(mpg ~ hp*vs*am, data = mtcars)
display(parameters(mod.full))
```
